tests.name: test_function_returns_expected_value
tests.description: Test that the function returns the expected value for normal input.

tests.name: test_function_handles_edge_case
tests.description: Test that the function handles edge case input.

tests.name: test_function_raises_exception
tests.description: Test that the function raises an exception for invalid input.
tests.code:
from my_module import my_function
with self.assertRaises(ValueError):
    my_function(-1)

tests.name: test_class_initialization
tests.description: Test that the class initializes with correct attributes.
tests.code:
from my_module import MyClass
obj = MyClass('test')
self.assertEqual(obj.name, 'test')

tests.name: test_class_method
tests.description: Test that the class method returns the correct result.
tests.code:
from my_module import MyClass
obj = MyClass('test')
self.assertTrue(obj.is_valid())
